Transaction ID.semantic_description: A unique identifier for each individual transaction conducted at the cafe.

Item.semantic_description: The name of the product or item purchased in the transaction.

Quantity.semantic_description: The number of units of the item purchased in this transaction.

Price Per Unit.semantic_description: The cost of one item or unit as specified at the time of transaction.

Total Spent.semantic_description: The total amount of money spent on the transaction, calculated as the product of quantity and price per unit.

Payment Method.semantic_description: The method used by the customer to pay for the transaction, such as cash, credit card, etc.

Location.semantic_description: The physical or virtual location where the sale or transaction took place.

Transaction Date.semantic_description: The date when the transaction was processed or completed.

dirty_cafe_sales.description: This table captures detailed records of individual sales transactions at a cafe, tracking what was sold, quantities, pricing, and payment details.

database_description: This database serves the retail domain, specifically managing and analyzing sales transactions in a cafe setting. It contains transactional data reflecting customer purchases including items sold, quantities, pricing, payment methods, and more, facilitating business insights into sales performance and customer preferences.
